overview: "LUZ OFERENDA (OFFERING LIGHT) is a quantum leap towards the future where sound and images are interconnected. Cutting-edge 3D computer animation fuses with dramatic music to create a journey that defies the imagination. A small whisper beckons you to return home, to the present, where the only true reality exists to offer your light. Acclaimed computer animator Beny Tchaicovsky's surrealistic, fantastical images."
title: Luz Oferenda
